review: Despite the lack of Australian servers and a rather small online community, this is a space combat sim with quite a lot of depth. Ship types and abilities are diverse and interesting, from devestating broadsides, disabling beams and quick flickering jumps you can utilize to get behind your opponent. The focus on team tactics is strong and the glacial pace (compared to other 'shooters') is a refreshing change - you're forced to think and outmaneouver your enemies instead of just gunning them down.
